charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess w/intent to distribute approx. 40 kilos of cocaine. 21:841(a)(l) &; 841(b)(l)(A). Offense Date: 4/3/97. PENALTY: Not less than l0 yrs. nor more than life imprisonment w/o probation, parole or suspended sentence and a fine of up to $4 million, at least 5 yrs. SRT, $100 spec. assessment. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 81 months BOP, 5 years Supervised Release Term, $100.00 special assessment (1)

charges.charge_description: Knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully possess w/intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act of 1970, to wit: 89 lbs. (approx. gross weight) or 40.45 kilos of cocaine. 21:841(a)(l) [2:97-m-93]
